content: antonio s summer cappello is the second of four seasonal hats in ***the four seasons*** collection it is widely believed by music historians that antonio vivaldi s inspiration for the four seasons stems from the time he spent as the court chapel master in the gorgeous countryside of mantua italy like its companion vivaldi summer mitts this pattern brings to mind a relaxing stroll along a meandering stream knit in a light cotton-linen blend it is a perfect shade hat on a sunny afternoon knit in wool it is a cozy warm hat for a bright frosty day this cappello is sized to fit an average teen/adult head 21-23 inches/53-58cm knit in dk yarn in either one or two colors for brim and underbrim with a flat i-cord hatband that is tied in back allowing you to create the perfect fit for a single color hat 220 yards + 30-45 yards for hatband for a two color hat 160 yards color a + 60 yards color b + 30-45 yards for hatband antonio s summer cappello has been test knit in lieu of paying a fee for this pattern please consider making a donation to world central kitchen since 2010 world central kitchen has been providing meals to communities affected by conflict natural disasters and climate crisis all over the world https //wck org
